## BasicExtrudedLineTechniqueParams.caps property

Style of both end caps. Possible values: `"None"`<!-- -->, `"Circle"`<!-- -->. A value of undefined maps to `"Circle"`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
caps?: DynamicProperty<"None" | "Circle">;
```
